problems.title: Shortest Subarray With Sum At Least K (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given an integer array nums and an integer k, return the length of the shortest non-empty subarray of nums with a sum of at least k. If there is no such subarray, return -1.

Input Format:
First line: two integers n and k.
Second line: n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print the length of the shortest subarray.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
